1370: Ermegardis moved to Cromme straet.D.10 after marriage.
Got married to Lubertus at age 15 in 1370.
Gave birth to Lutbrandus in 1370 at age 15.
1372: Gave birth to Tiuri in 1372 at age 17.
1373: Gave birth to Badeloghen in 1373 at age 18.
1375: Gave birth to Aleydis in 1375 at age 20.
1380: Gave birth to Elberino in 1380 at age 25.
1382: Gave birth to Moys in 1382 at age 27.
1384: Lost son Lutbrandus when Lutbrandus was 15 years old.
1385: Died while giving birth to Beatrice in 1385 at age 30.
